researchExperiences.title: Research Intern - Computer-Aided Design and Fabrication of Carbon Fiber Aircraft
researchExperiences.description: Participated in the 2024 NPU Sino-Euro Spring School at Northwestern Polytechnical University (NPU), the world's #2 university in Aerospace Engineering, in Xi'an, China. Worked with Professor Lubin Huo on carbon fiber applications in the aircraft industry.
achievements: Learned to leverage computer tools for designing and manufacturing carbon fiber-reinforced resin matrix composite laminated aircraft crafts
Studied advanced techniques for computer-aided design (CAD) and fabrication of composite materials
Explored applications of carbon fiber composites in improving aircraft performance and fuel efficiency
Participated in hands-on sessions and research discussions with leading aerospace engineering professors and students

researchExperiences.title: Research Intern - Behavioral Changes due to Virtual Reality
researchExperiences.description: Conducted a 2-month research internship on behavioral changes due to Virtual Reality at Suwa University, Nagano, Japan. Worked with Professor Yamaguchi Takehiko.
achievements: Designed and executed VR experiments to study user behavior and psychological impacts of immersive technologies
Analyzed experimental data using statistical methods, identifying key behavioral patterns and correlations
Developed VR prototypes using Unity for research simulations and user testing
Presented research findings at university symposiums

competitionLeadershipExperiences.title: Competition Achievements
competitionLeadershipExperiences.description: Competed in multiple international and national computer science competitions.
achievements: Part of the INSA Lyon ICPC team (2024, 2025)
3rd in France in ICPC (SWERC 2025), I'm going to compete at the 2026 ICPC European Championship
1st place in a France-IOI contest (Castor Informatique 2020) among more than 500,000 participants
1st place in Match'Up Coding Battle (formerly Le Shaker) 2020 among more than 2000 participants
Now responsible for designing contest exercises

competitionLeadershipExperiences.title: Volunteer & Community Leader at INSAlgo & Tech Communities
competitionLeadershipExperiences.description: Active member and organizer in tech communities, leading initiatives to foster learning, collaboration, and professional development in computer science and programming.
